channel.title: D Claws

item.title: D Claws
item.dc:creator: @lmfaoown lmfaoown
item.description:
@lmfaoown wrote:

[quote=“silabgarza, post:1, topic:260626”]okay well i tryed adding dclaws… it works fine but the hits r awful…

2mzf4z.png771×550

as u can see… ALL 0’S i need a profesional coder to help me with this…

heres the code i tryed out…

public int dclaws = 0; public void dclawed2() { client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn]; int clawed2 = misc.random(playerMaxHit/2); if(AttackingOn2 != null) { if(AttackingOn2.currentHealth <= 0) { dclaws = 0; } else { PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true; if(misc.random(3) != 1) { PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = clawed2; } else { updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; // Updates PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = 0; } updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; // Updates PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = hitDiff; } } } public void dclawed() { client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn]; int clawed = misc.random(playerMaxHit); if(AttackingOn2 != null) { if(AttackingOn2.currentHealth <= 0) { dclaws = 0; } else { PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true; if(misc.random(3) != 1) { PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = clawed; } else { PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = 0; } PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = hitDiff; } } }

and in process i put…

if(dclaws == 3) { dclawed(); } if(dclaws == 2) { startAnimation(2068); dclawed2(); } if(dclaws == 1) { dclawed2(); //actionInterval = getbattleTimer() + getbattleTimer()/2; } if(dclaws > 0) { dclaws -= 1; }

also, please convert it to make it work on npc’s and players instead of just players

SOURCE: Czar v1.2 (cleaned) - (silabgarza)

all help apreciated

IF U NO A BETTER CODE, PLEASE SHARE![/quote]

didn’t you just say moparscape was anti-spoonfeed? your so stupid. asshole

Read full topic

item.title: D Claws
item.dc:creator: @irKevin irKevin
item.description:
@irKevin wrote:

We changed it to 506 bonus, but it still hits 3 0’s and 1 max. For example:
If you spec you hit:
0
0
0
20-70 (with 506 bonus)

the 3 other zeroes don’t hit for some reason…

item.title: D Claws

item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

okay well i tryed adding dclaws… it works fine but the hits r awful…

2mzf4z.png771×550

as u can see… ALL 0’S i need a profesional coder to help me with this…

heres the code i tryed out…

public int dclaws = 0; public void dclawed2() { client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn]; int clawed2 = misc.random(playerMaxHit/2); if(AttackingOn2 != null) { if(AttackingOn2.currentHealth <= 0) { dclaws = 0; } else { PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true; if(misc.random(3) != 1) { PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = clawed2; } else { updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; // Updates PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = 0; } updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; // Updates PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = hitDiff; } } } public void dclawed() { client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn]; int clawed = misc.random(playerMaxHit); if(AttackingOn2 != null) { if(AttackingOn2.currentHealth <= 0) { dclaws = 0; } else { PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true; if(misc.random(3) != 1) { PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = clawed; } else { PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = 0; } PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = hitDiff; } } }

and in process i put…

if(dclaws == 3) { dclawed(); } if(dclaws == 2) { startAnimation(2068); dclawed2(); } if(dclaws == 1) { dclawed2(); //actionInterval = getbattleTimer() + getbattleTimer()/2; } if(dclaws > 0) { dclaws -= 1; }

also, please convert it to make it work on npc’s and players instead of just players
